resources:
Pool-Calculator Home Help About us Imprint Rectangle Circle This app calculates the required amount of water depending on the pool shape and the dimensions entered. The result is displayed in cubic meters. Enter dimensions Length in meters Radius in meters Width in meters Height in meters Function of the App: Choose your pool shape Welcome to Calculate pool water Rectangle Spherical Dimension input for rectangular pool Dimension input for spherical pool Your pool needs the following amount of water (in cbm): Height: Width: Length: Radius: Wateramount in cbm = Length * Width * Height Wateramount in cbm = π * r^2 * Height Rectangular pool Spherical pool Calculate Imprint of the HMNJ Software Solutions GmbH HMNJ Software Solutions GmbH Erna-Scheffler-Stra√üe 1A 51103 Cologne-Kalk Germany Represented by: Hendrik Jan Hinteman Marcel Maurice Schneider\ Nils Strehlau Jan-Hendrik Budde Sales tax identification number to section 27a of the sales tax act DE2934128056 Contact Phone: +49221 81843 Fax: +49221 81833 Email: support@hmnj.de Web: Google Welcome to HMNJ Software Solutions GmbH - your partner for customized app development from Cologne. Our company may seem compact with a dedicated team of 4 professionals, but it is our size that allows us to respond flexibly and purposefully to the individual needs of our clients. 
Our philosophy is simple: We live and breathe software solutions. Here at HMNJ, we rely on passion, dedication and a deep commitment to innovation and sustainability. We firmly believe that the key to outstanding digital products lies in the combination of advanced technical know-how and a thoughtful approach to sustainability. From our headquarters in the heart of Cologne, we pursue these goals with a tireless commitment to perfection. 
Integration and versatility are at the heart of our work. With a small but fine team we cover all relevant areas - from management to sales, costing, support to programming. Everyone in our team brings unique skills that allow us to look at complex projects from different perspectives and develop solutions that are not only technically sophisticated, but also pragmatic and customer oriented. 
Our business areas include: 
- Management: Responsible for the coordination of our experts and the strategic orientation. - Sales: Develops efficient sales channels to place our solutions optimally. - Calculation: Provides transparent and comprehensible cost calculations for our customers. - Support: Provides first-class customer support through multiple channels, including a hotline. - Programming: Our core, responsible for the implementation of innovative app solutions. 
We stand for innovation, integrity, customer focus and team spirit. These values guide us in everything we do and enable us to not only meet but exceed the expectations of our customers. 
At HMNJ Software Solutions GmbH, we combine technical expertise with creative vision to actively shape the digital future. Explore our software solutions where ingenuity meets reliability - always innovative, always reliable and always one step ahead.
